article_title: Don't Let These 7 Myths Stop You From Retiring Early

article_metadata.description: When would you like to retire? When I ask this question to my workshop participants, the most common answer I get is "today." ("Yesterday" is the second most common answer.) While many people dream of early retirement, too often they feel like it's more of a pipe dream. The reality [...]
